roleset.name: (try to) cause motion
roleset.note: PUSH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls carry-11.4-1-1, funnel-9.3-2-1, hold-15.1-1, push-12-1-1, split-23.2. Comparison with 'pull', 'force' 'move'. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from push.01-v)
PUSH-N NOTES: Based on verb entry push.01. Corresponds to Vncls carry-11.4-1-1, funnel-9.3-2-1, hold-15.1-1, push-12-1-1, split-23.2. Comparison with 'pull', 'force' 'move'. (from push.01-n)

example.name: semi-literal movement
example.text: Moreover, the amended pact shows how McCaw's persistence has pushed LIN and BellSouth into a corner, forcing huge debt on the proposed new company.
example.arg: forcing huge debt on the proposed new company

example.name: stock prices
example.text: Small-lot buying targeted at incentive-backed issues pushed up the Nikkei.
example.arg: Small-lot buying targeted at incentive-backed issues

example.name: two mentions of direction
example.text: Speculative investors, betting on an imminent clash between Ford and GM, pushed up Jaguar's share price five pence (eight U.S. cents) to a near-record 720 pence ($11.60) in late trading on London's stock exchange yesterday.
example.arg: betting on an imminent clash between Ford and GM
in late trading on London's stock exchange

example.name: Congressional pushing
example.text: But Mr. Brady endorsed the market-revision bill that-1 [both houses of Congress]-2 will try [*-2]to push [*T*-1] through this session.

example.name: all arguments, metaphorical
example.text: Rob Dyrdek has been getting a lot of flack lately for his push of skateboarding into the mainstream.

roleset.name: force, impelled action
roleset.note: PUSH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from push.02-v)

example.name: all args, expected positions
example.text: The analysts argued that Georgia-Pacific's offer, the first hostile bid ever among major players in the paper industry...will push managements to look closely at the industry's several attractive takeover candidates.
example.arg: Georgia-Pacific's offer, the first hostile bid ever among major players in the paper industry,
to look closely at the industry's several attractive takeover candidates

example.name: almost dead
example.text: Linda and Michael (Ms. Close and Mr. Woods), who-1 [*trace*-1]-2 seem [*-2]to be pushing 40, live in a large and tastefully decorated home in suburban Seattle.

example.name: push the boundaries
example.text: Gulf of Mexico operators push the boundaries of deepwater development.

role.descr: thing pushed, goal arg0 is striving to achieve

example.text: Singer Coco Lee pushes Pacific Cellular's prepaid card.
He is not pushing any particular viewpoint.

example.name: Within LVC,
example.text: Three seats currently are vacant and three others are likely to be filled within a few years , so patent lawyers and research - based industries are making a new push for specialists to be added to the court .
example.arg: patent lawyers and research - based industries
for specialists to be added to the court .

example.name: all args
example.text: The Udall brothers continue their push for a national renewable energy.

roleset.name: arm strengthening exercise
roleset.note: PUSH_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5. No VNcls. (from push.03-n)

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: The lack of ideal training centers in Park City meant that benches were in short supply, so we did push-ups instead
